DOC.brief_summary: The study design assess effect cyclooxygenase inhibition blood pressure , cerebral blood flow , ventilation renal hemodynamics follow chronic intermittent hypoxia exposure .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Selective Nonselective Cyclooxygenase Enzyme Inhibition Arterial Blood Pressure Cerebral Blood Flow With Exposure Intermittent Hypoxia Humans
DOC.detailed_description: The study specifically evaluate : 1 . Cardiovascular effect cyclooxygenase inhibitor cerebral , vascular , blood pressure homeostatic response follow chronic intermittent hypoxia exposure . 2 . Ventilatory response cyclooxygenase inhibitor follow chronic intermittent hypoxia exposure 3 . Evaluate renal hemodynamic effect chronic intermittent hypoxia exposure cyclooxygenase inhibition .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject 18 45 year age Informed write consent Any history cardiorespiratory disease , ongoing medication , smoking , trauma , acute illness , collagen vascular disease , rheumatoid arthritis , osteoarthritis
